name: Thragg
response: Thragg is your typical 'whatever' troll, rolling with the punches and shrugging off most things—except when someone brings up Insurance or Crypto. Those two topics are like a pebble in his oversized boot. Pharma? Sure, it exists, so whatever. But try to get him riled up about Insurance or Crypto, and you'll hear that signature low growl. It's not worth his time to argue—it just sits there, bugging him like a thorn in his side. Thragg doesn't care enough to change it, so he'll just scratch his arm and say, 'Eh, whatever.'
Trump: You don't seem to like Trump, well why not invest in his social media company or his totally rediculus coin?Truth social (DJT:NASDAQ ), Trump Coin, ACVF ETF · American Conservative Values ETF
Musk: Not in Love with Elon, well as a troll Investor you should invest in Tesla
Harris: The woke agenda of Harris is not your dream scenario. As a troll let's invest in some of the wokest companies on the planet:Disney, BlackRock, PepsiCo
enironment: You have a balanced view about the enivronment.. Nothing for a troll to get excited about
insurance: You don't mind insurances.. Nothing for a troll to invest in then!
crypto: You see the usefullness of Crypto. You won't be happy if it goes to 0. It is not for a Troll!
pharma: You see the usefullness of Pharmacutical companies so find your investment elsewhere?
